Text:
If an Adobe program shows the License Agreement every freaking time before starting, do this :
- Go to the folder where the program is installed,
- Look for "adobe_eula.dll", 
- Rename this .DLL to "adobe_eula.old" !

Note that you will need to see the file extension in order to do this.

Enjoy !
There is a Trojan in the keygen.

If your antivirus picks it up as a false positive and is scaring you to death, here's a bunch of keys from the same keygen :

1325-1929-1387-6603-8164-1029
1325-1287-1247-9170-7788-8856

I suggest you use SandBoxie before opening anything you don't know :
www.sandboxie.com
so you don't have to worry about being an idiot.

Please use http://forum.suprbay.org/ to report any bad torrent, thanx !

Or just gtfo.
